title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project is not visible or accessible.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, either both Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither of them should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Select both P1 and P2.
2. Check if the Open Project menu item is available.
3. Check if the Close Project menu item is visible or accessible.
